p: Analysis of circulating cytokines revealed markedly elevated IL‐8, IL‐6, and TNF‐α levels. In contrast, IL‐5, which plays a key role in allergic eosinophilic inflammation, was not elevated. However, the patient's IgE level was mildly elevated, suggesting a partial allergic response. Elevated IL‐8 has been reported in IgE‐mediated lung disease [4], supporting the possibility of an overlapping allergic component.
